message.content:
cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SOC, cs.MM, cs.LG 

This paper deals with the analysis of large-scale online video networks and the impact of recommender systems on collective social attention. The paper uses network analysis, machine learning, and data mining techniques to study the structure of the Vevo network and the attention dynamics of its videos. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval), as the paper deals with the recommendation system and predicting video popularity. The paper also touches upon topics related to cs.SOC (Social and Economic Networks), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.LG (Machine Learning), as it uses machine learning techniques to develop a model for estimating attention flow and analyzes the impact of the recommendation network on the attention allocation.
